pullRequest.title: Handle DeckConfig."timer" as boolean
pullRequest.bodyText:
Notes
Value is written (only other grep for "timer"): 
  
    
      Anki-Android/AnkiDroid/src/main/java/com/ichi2/anki/DeckOptions.java
    
    
         Line 270
      in
      5d0eb69
    
    
    
    

        
          
           mOptions.put("timer", (Boolean) value ? 1 : 0); 
        
    
  


I've previously tested the options, and no other crashes were found on other properties.
Purpose / Description
Anki 2.1.24 converted this to an boolean, reverted in 2.1.25, but we need to coerce it back to avoid a crash.
Fixes
Fixes #6089
Approach
Fallback to boolean parsing if integer parsing fails. Remove unused method
How Has This Been Tested?
On my device, both on 2.1.24 collection and my normal collection
Checklist

 You have not changed whitespace unnecessarily (it makes diffs hard to read)
 You have a descriptive commit message with a short title (first line, max 50 chars).
 Your code follows the style of the project (e.g. never omit braces in if statements)
 You have commented your code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
 You have performed a self-review of your own code

commit.message:
Handle DeckConfig."timer" as boolean

Anki 2.1.24 converted this to an boolean, reverted in 2.1.25, but we
need to coerce it back to avoid a crash.

Fixes #6089
